Docs.summary: The main interface of the sweeper

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.ML.ParameterSet[] ProposeSweeps (int maxSweeps, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.ML.IRunResult> previousRuns = null);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.ML.ParameterSet[] ProposeSweeps(int32 maxSweeps, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.ML.IRunResult> previousRuns) cil managed
Public Function ProposeSweeps (maxSweeps As Integer, Optional previousRuns As IEnumerable(Of IRunResult) = null) As ParameterSet()
abstract member ProposeSweeps : int * seq<Microsoft.ML.IRunResult> -> Microsoft.ML.ParameterSet[]

Docs.summary: Returns between 0 and maxSweeps configurations to run. It expects a list of previous runs such that it can generate configurations that were not already tried. The list of runs can be null if there were no previous runs. Some smart sweepers can take advantage of the metric(s) that the caller computes for previous runs.
